# <type>: <short summary in lowercase, imperative mood>
# (max 50 characters)

# Optional longer description here (wrap at 72 characters)
#
# Common types:
#   feat:     a new feature
#   fix:      a bug fix
#   docs:     documentation only changes
#   style:    formatting, no code change
#   refactor: code change without adding features or fixing bugs
#   test:     adding or updating tests
#   chore:    maintenance tasks like deps, configs
#
# Example:
# feat: add day01 exercise for hello world
